content: **little star mandala cal** part 1 1 part 2 2 part 3 3 this pattern has been a crochet a- long in december 2021 you can find the pattern for free on my blog www lostincrochet com/blog in 4 blogposts it s only written in us terms on my blog the little star mandala is made using a mercerized cotton yarn called fiol 50g/169m/185yd from solberg spinderi and hook size 2 5 mm amount of yarn needed is about 25 g it measures 28 cm across after blocking you can choose any kind of cotton yarn you like i also think it will be pretty using linen yarn a thicker yarn will give a bigger mandala the pattern is translated into us terms and norwegian and has a written instruction enjoy 1 https //www lostincrochet com/blog/title-1 2 https //www lostincrochet com/blog/title-2 3 https //www lostincrochet com/blog/title-3
